content:
Than kalppanayaal bhrthyanmaar-kalppaathrangallilettiya neer
Svaadum menmayumereedum-veenyaakki theertthaan kartthan
Manavaallanu thuna cheythone paanam cheythor keertthichu.
Veenyu virunnil theernnathinaal-varane aagatharellaarum
Nindikkunnathu kandaare-kartthaavettam duà´ƒkhichu
Sneham moolam kalpichu-vellllatthe nal veenyaakki.
